Text.Name: Talk_DanXia
Text.Hate.3: How dare you! Did I permit you to look at me?
Text.Like.0: Doing well lately? I think we should talk.
Text.Submiss.0: Which treasure do you prefer? Whatever you like.
Text.ValueableTrade.0: Your price for the resources is too high, but I will not change my opinion toward you.
Text.ValueableTrade.1: You are actually at a loss in this deal, but since we've made a deal, that's it.
Text.TryOkTrade.0: Yes, we can make this deal.
Text.NoTrade.2: Sorry, but I don't think so.
Text.OkTrade.0: Hope to trade with you again.
Text.GiftLike.0: Is this really a gift for me? I've wanted this for so many years.
Text.Task.0: Thanks a lot. This is indeed what we need.
Text.TaskNeed.0: Thank you so much but these are not enough for us.
Text.TaskNeed.1: These things are really useful, but we need more.
Text.Task.0: This is right on time. Thanks a lot.
Text.Task.1: Great, this solved our pressing need.
Text.Task.2: What a relief. This is exactly what we need.
Text.LowValueGift.0: This is completely useless. We do not need it at all.
Text.LowValueGift.1: Don't you think it is offensive to give this to us?
Text.MidValueGift.0: This item is useful for first-time cultivators. But I have no need for it.
Text.MidValueGift.1: Thanks, but our sect doesn't need this.
Text.HighValueGift.0: I can't say no to such a precious treasure. But your over-enthusiasm won't do anything for me.
Text.NoEnoughFriendPoint.0: I don't owe you anything. You can't have this.
Text.NoEnoughFriendPoint.1: Our sect treasures can't be purchased by only spirit stones.
Text.NoEnoughFriendPoint.2: You can't easily purchase this kind of treasure.
Text.Invalid.0: I don't think we are on friendly terms.
Text.Invalid.1: No, we won't sell it to you.
